name: Piyush Sharma
text: Awesome pizza at awesome rate. The server is even better & fun to chat with. He suggested us various options and suggested to add garlic butter which made the pizza even better

name: Tanisha Robinson
text: Our pizza guy is personable and always nice to my family.  The only thing is they never have pies ready to go.  Although there is a little wait... He always give my children cookies and adds a special garlic touch to it!!

name: ScodaWithLime
text: Best pizza deal you can get I think I prefer their pan pizzas but it was still a solid pizza. The people who work there are really friendly and they keep the place super clean

name: Paul Gaglioti
text: I used to go here all the time and the pizza and everything was perfect the extra most bestest, but today I went in and they made it how I like it but it didn't even have enough cheese covering the whole pizza for the one with extra cheese. ‚Ä¶More

name: Moiz Ahmad
text: It was great. That guys inside really friendly and funny. The store was clean like really clean.

name: jose vazquez
text: Clean, friendly, courteous, & lets not forget pretty good

name: Mike Smith
text: Excellent pizza.  Very well run establishment and spectacular prices.  Thank You.

name: John Doe
text: The manager and staff are the best! Very helpful and provide excellent, cheap pizza. Not to mention the manager is cute. I go every week and love the spiccyyyy thick wings

name: Tyesh D
text: sauce-less pizzas....I didn't order deep dish cheesy bread I ordered deep dish pepperoni...They seem to have a quota on the amount of sauce they are able to put on a pizza. I guess whoever train them to make pizzas put them on a sauce restriction...They need to get it all the way together..People like sauce on their pizzas

name: MiSS JeaNiuS
text: Very nice workers. However, all the other Little Caesars are using the Pizza Portal...and they aren't. Why?

name: Paul A. Gaglioti Jr.
text: Pizza was lacking and toppings got the extra most bestest and the cheese didn't even cover the whole pizza the center had nothing on it, manager / owner would not help me or resolve the issue, extremely unfriendly did not do anything about it and threw pizza and garbage. Recommend going elsewhere for anything better!

name: Matthew Cosenza
text: The management was very nice, Little Caesar pizza itself was fine, if you have ever eaten at any Little Caesars they all taste exactly the same

name: Andrew Kraus
text: The owner seems like a good guy and this location is new with new equipment , a no brainer if you want fast food pizza. It's good

name: Richard Patel
text: I didn't like that I has to wait 7 minutes for a pizza to be made and the staff didn't know where the spices were.  Store is clean. People are nice.

name: Roger Amacle
text: The service was great but there were no "Hot-N-Ready" pizzas ready, or being prepared or baked for that matter. The quality was good, but this was not a quick stop conventional for the other franchises I've been to. I visited during the late afternoon hours.

name: ROBERT N
text: Fast and friendly  I was out in a couple mins home enjoying hot fresh pizza with my family...

name: Tracy Gutierrez
text: Nice owner, very friendly. Good pizza

name: Paul Cortapasso
text: The new thin crust is very good

name: Leyla Sasunova
text: Very nice, clean place with friendly staff and delicious pizza!!!

name: Johnny Cash
text: This place is awesome! I would definitely come here again. I have been wanting to come here ever since my friend mentioned that this was the best place for Korean Meat. ‚Ä¶More

The pizza here is a liitle more expensive than other locations

I went here and no pizzas were actually ready, but it was ok with me to wait for ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom Pavlick
text: This is the fast food of pizza joints.. with nothing fast about it.  No hot and ready were ready, barely any sauce on the classic cheese, the bbq pork and bacon was ok, pork was dry and seemed old. Meh, ok price for just ok pizza, nothing to write home about except the clean unisex bathroom.

name: Marcos Ruiz
text: Good but other none known pizzerias are better

name: Fuquan Fraguada
text: Not bad. Quick and filling.

name: Shi Patel
text: Pizza takes worst than school lunch. It's overpriced and taste like cardboard. It was my first and last time. Even the service  was  subpar at best. I won't recommend this to anyone trying pizza near me.

name: Wayne Huber
text: I saw ad for $5 wings went to by them and they were so small. It was not worth the money . I got bigger wings at shoprite . What a bunch of false advertising, you will never see me at lil ceasar s again. Dont believe what you see on there commercial
